        Description copied from interface: StateMachineProvider

      • getDetailedViewForProtocolDataUnit

        public javax.swing.JComponent getDetailedViewForProtocolDataUnit(EchoMessage pdu,
                                                                 HtmlInfoUpdater htmlInfoUpdater)
        Description copied from interface: ViewProvider
        Should return a view with details of the protocol data unit. This method will be called for every protocol data unit which is selected in the protocol data unit list.
        Specified by:
        getDetailedViewForProtocolDataUnit in interface ViewProvider<EchoMessage>
        Parameters:
        pdu - the protocol data unit
        htmlInfoUpdater - an updater to set the info view content
        Returns:
        the detailed view

      • getViewForClientStateMachine

        public javax.swing.JComponent getViewForClientStateMachine(HtmlInfoUpdater htmlInfoUpdater)
        Description copied from interface: ViewProvider
        Should return a view displaying the client state. This method will be only be called once on application startup, so the view should be stored to react to state updates.
        Specified by:
        getViewForClientStateMachine in interface ViewProvider<EchoMessage>
        Parameters:
        htmlInfoUpdater - an updater to set the info view content
        Returns:
        the client view

      • getViewForServerStateMachine

        public javax.swing.JComponent getViewForServerStateMachine(HtmlInfoUpdater htmlInfoUpdater)
        Description copied from interface: ViewProvider
        Should return a view displaying the server state. This method will only be called once on application startup, so the view should be stored to react to state updates.
        Specified by:
        getViewForServerStateMachine in interface ViewProvider<EchoMessage>
        Parameters:
        htmlInfoUpdater - an updater to set the info view content
        Returns:
        the server view

      • updateServerView

        public void updateServerView()
        Description copied from interface: ViewProvider
        Will be called when the server state machines notifyObserversOfStateChanged method is called. The server view should be updated to display the new state.
        Specified by:
        updateServerView in interface ViewProvider<EchoMessage>

      • updateClientView

        public void updateClientView()
        Description copied from interface: ViewProvider
        Will be called when the client state machines notifyObserversOfStateChanged method is called. The client view should be updated to display the new state.
        Specified by:
        updateClientView in interface ViewProvider<EchoMessage>

      • getSettingsView

        public javax.swing.JComponent getSettingsView()
        Description copied from interface: ViewProvider
        Should return a view displaying (optional) settings for the protocol. Will be shown in the start protocol view. Settings changes must be handled by the provider itself.
        Specified by:
        getSettingsView in interface ViewProvider<EchoMessage>
        Returns:
        a preferences view

      • getHtmlAboutContent

        public java.lang.String getHtmlAboutContent()
        Description copied from interface: ViewProvider

        Specified by:
        getHtmlAboutContent in interface ViewProvider<EchoMessage>
        Returns:
        the HTML content
